text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/supply-item-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
medication MedicationSupply is a kind of medication.
device DeviceWhat is supplied (or requested) is a device.

name: SupplyItemType
title: Supply Item Type
description: This value sets refers to a specific supply item.
copyright: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

concept.definition: Supply is a kind of medication.
What is supplied (or requested) is a device.
